QUORUM().notice: Number of votes required for quorum

disputes(bytes32).notice: Mapping from case ID to dispute case data

finalizeIfExpired(bytes32).notice: Finalize dispute if voting period expired with quorum

getEvidences(bytes32).notice: Get all evidences for a case

getResolution(bytes32).notice: Get resolution for a dispute (called by escrow contract)

getVotes(bytes32).notice: Get all votes for a case

hasVoted(bytes32,address).notice: Mapping to track if arbitrator has voted on a case

submitEvidence(bytes32,string).notice: Submit additional evidence for a dispute

vote(bytes32,uint256).notice: Cast a vote on a dispute
